alert.note: Alert for Edgecombe; Wilson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 7:26PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Edgecombe and eastern Wilson Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 725 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Rocky Mount, moving southeast at 30 mph. Another storm was developing just north of Elm City, moving southeast at 30 mph as well. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tarboro, Wilson, Elm City, Princeville, Sharpsburg, Pinetops, Stantonsburg, Macclesfield, Saratoga and Conetoe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
